description.brief: Collection of ROS GUI tools and libraries

package.description:
rxtools is two things. First it is a library of GUI widgets (written in wxWidgets) that can be embedded in other applications. Second it is a set of GUI applications that view/manage ROS state. These GUI applications include rxconsole and rxplot.
Pieces of rxtools use some icons from the silk icon pack (http://www.famfamfam.com/lab/icons/silk/)
package.author: Josh Faust, Rob Wheeler, Ken Conley
